item.title: Research
item.description: Revisiting Random Forest Interpretability and Feature Selection This research paper explores advanced interpretability methods for Random Forest models. Links: Read on arXiv PDF Download

item.title: Speaking Sessions
item.description: Featured Presentations Below are some of my recent sessions covering Apache Iceberg, Hudi, and the Open Lakehouse stack. Making Lakehouse Table Formats & Catalogs work for you | Data Engineering Open Forum 2025 This talk will go over XTable’s architecture and its capabilities, designed to support omnidirectional translation between open table formats. By utilizing shared metadata information, XTable enables continuous metadata translation across these formats, allowing data to be accessed by various compute engines and workflows without duplication or extensive rewrites

item.title: Writing
item.description: Featured Technical Blogs Apache Iceberg: Key Innovations So Far Apache Parquet vs. Newer File Formats What is Apache Arrow Flight & ADBC? Concurrency Control in Apache Hudi ACID Transactions in a Lakehouse How Z-Ordering in Apache Iceberg Helps Performance Getting Started with Flink SQL and Apache Iceberg
